errors.error_description: The command `lobsterpy plot --bonds 1,2` uses an incorrect flag and syntax to specify which bonds to plot.
correction_candidates: ``lobsterpy plot --bonds "1 2"`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
``lobsterpy plot 1,2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
``lobsterpy plot --bond 1 --bond 2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
``lobsterpy plot 1 2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
errors.golden_answer: ``lobsterpy plot 1 2`` will plot COHPs of the first and second bond from ``COHPCAR.lobster``.
